main event: A civilian ground observer sighted a round object with a greenish-white flashing light and a red rim in Allen, Maryland on September 12, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 35 minutes., The object was sighted at an altitude of about 2,000 feet., The sighting was conducted using field glasses., No electronic equipment detected any aircraft or targets in the area during the sighting., Weather conditions were clear with visibility of 10 miles.
sighted object: round object with a greenish-white light and a red rim
witness description: Civilian ground observer volunteer and his wife, known occupation is a salesman in a grocery store.
